headline: Is There Now an Opportunity in Newmont After 17% Share Price Drop?
summary: If you have been following Newmont lately, you know the stock hasn’t exactly been a quiet ride. With shares closing recently at $78.63, Newmont has seen dramatic swings: down 17.1% in the last week and 7.8% over the past month. Yet, zoom out a bit and a different story stands out. Year-to-date, Newmont is up a jaw-dropping 104.9%, and still up 65.9% over the last year. With a strong three-year return of 103.3% and a healthy 42.8% over five years, the company’s long-term gains are hard to...

headline: Dow Futures Dip as Fed Rate Cut Uncertainty Looms
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Tuesday, Oct, 28 2025 US stock futures are starting Tuesday in negative territory as investors weigh the Federal Reserve’s upcoming rate decision against fresh signs of tension in global trade. With the Fed likely to announce a rate cut, attention is focused on how policymakers will interpret recent moves by the US and its partners to secure critical minerals. This has rekindled market concerns about supply chain disruptions, and questions remain...
